1.t: When the earth is shaken by a terrible quake

2.t: and it throws out its burden,

3.t: the human being will say (in horror), "What is happening to it?"

4.t: On that day the earth will declare all (the activities of the human being) which have taken place on it,

5.t: having been inspired by your Lord.

6.t: On that day, people will come out of their graves in different groups to see (the results of) their own deeds.
6.tr: Yawma-iziny yas-durun naasu ash-tatal liyuraw a'maalahum

7.t: Whoever has done an atom's weight of good,
7.tr: Famaiy ya'mal mithqala zarratin khai-raiy yarah

8.t: will see it and whoever has done an atom's weight of evil, will also see it.
8.tr: Wa-maiy y'amal mithqala zarratin sharraiy yarah
